title: Characterizing the Interdiffusion Layer and Plating Layers in a Press Hardened 22MnB5 Steel Grade using an Image Analysis Software
content: Quantifying the influence of austenitizing parameters on Al-Si coating evolution aids in improving the processibility and performance of aluminized hot-formed steels. This work utilizes methods created using MIPAR, an image analysis software, on coating cross-sectional images. The current analysis aims to characterize the coating evolution of the inter-diffusional alloy layer and Al-Si-Fe inter-metallic phases which develop during austenitizing. The data obtained from quantifying the area fraction and the thickness of the multiple phases was utilized to develop a hot-stamping processing model for Al-Si coated 22MnB5 steel.
